start.text: You’re in your apartment. 3:19AM. The TV is on. You don’t own a TV.

scene1.text: It’s dark. Empty cereal boxes on the table. VHS tapes scattered. You feel like something is watching from the static.

scene2.text: The screen flickers. Captain Chomp is gnawing on a mailbox. He stops and stares directly at you.

scene3.text: A distorted voice whispers through the speaker: “I’m still in the Vault. Do you remember Captain Chomp?”
